user.description: Please enter the credentials used to log into mytotalconnectcomfort.com.

reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: The Honeywell integration needs to re-authenticate your account

init.description: Additional Honeywell config options. Temperatures are set in Fahrenheit.

sys_mode_failed.message: Honeywell could not set system mode

fan_mode_failed.message: Honeywell could not set fan mode

temp_failed_value.message: Honeywell set temperature failed: invalid temperature {temperature}

temp_failed_range.message: Honeywell set temperature failed: temperature out of range. Mode: {mode}, Heat Temperuature: {heat}, Cool Temperature: {cool}

set_hold_failed.message: Honeywell could not set permanent hold

stop_hold_failed.message: Honeywell could not stop hold mode

set_aux_failed.message: Honeywell could not set system mode to aux heat

disable_aux_failed.message: Honeywell could turn off aux heat mode

switch_failed_off.message: Honeywell could turn off emergency heat mode.

switch_failed_on.message: Honeywell could not set system mode to emergency heat mode.

service_deprecation.title: Honeywell aux heat is being removed

confirm.title: [%key:component::honeywell::issues::service_deprecation::title%]
confirm.description:
Use `switch.{name}_emergency_heat` instead to change mode.

Please adjust your automations and scripts and select **submit** to fix this issue.
